item.value:
spring.application.name=LearnAlive
# Server set for heroku default 8080 server.port=${PORT:8080}
# 데이터베이스 연결 설정 spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/LearnAliveDB?useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC spring.datasource.username=root spring.datasource.password=1234 spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
# MyBatis set mybatis.configuration.log-impl=org.apache.ibatis.logging.stdout.StdOutImpl logging.level.org.mybatis=DEBUG logging.level.org.apache.ibatis=DEBUG logging.level.com.korea.attendance.repository=DEBUG
# Hibernate set spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true spring.jpa.show-sql=true
# React static resource setting #spring.web.resources.static-locations=classpath:/static/ spring.mvc.view.suffix=.html
# db connection killer spring.datasource.hikari.minimum-idle=2 spring.datasource.hikari.maximum-pool-size=10 spring.datasource.hikari.idle-timeout=30000 spring.datasource.hikari.max-lifetime=1800000 spring.datasource.hikari.connection-timeout=30000
